generated_text:
- road: The paved surface where vehicles are parked and driving, including the visible parking lines and the asphalt texture.
- sidewalk: The cobblestone area next to the parked cars, clearly separated from the road by a curb or edge.
- building: The multi-story structures with windows and roofs visible in the background and on the left side of the image.
- wall: The large stone wall on the right side of the image, which is an individual standing wall.
- fence: The metal railing or barrier partially visible next to the stone wall on the right.
- pole: The lamppost visible in the background behind the parked cars.
- vegetation: The large green tree in the middle ground and smaller bushes visible near the parked cars.
- terrain: The grass patches growing between the cobblestones on the sidewalk.
- sky: The visible portion of the sky above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: The man walking in the foreground, wearing a black t-shirt and jeans.
- car: The red Toyota parked on the right side of the road, and several other cars parked along the street.
- truck: The red van parked on the far left side of the street.
- motorcycle: The motorcycle parked near the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
